item.title: ps_categorytree - Change category root option
item.description: ps_categorytree - Change category root option Details Component : ps_categorytree Status : Approved Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-602 Steps Step Description Expected result Change the root category by Home category" and save" The option should be saved Go to FO scrolldown to the bottom click on the link all product. See the category tree and navigate. All product page should be displayed and the home category should be in the category bloc.
